resources.string: Enter the estimated number of clicks
You have entered wrong value format (int, mm:ss)
Time period is 1 second by default
The game is supposed to improve your Sense of Rhythm™ by giving you an opportunity to click once a period (which is not necessary).
Congrats! Your Sense of Rhythm™ is in excellent condition!
Train harder and improve your Sense of Rhythm™!
Your Sense of Rhythm™ leaves much to be desired.
